Text: RE Attached paper and September Panel MeetingRosalee Valerie Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday September AM To Garten Jeffrey Subject Re Attached paper and September Panel Meeting Good morning I was out during the timeframe that this was sent but Ken Lay did not give it back to us He is traveling now and totally inaccessible on vacation during the time of the meeting so he will not be participating Rosalee Garten Jeffrey on PM To cc Subject Attached paper and September Panel Meeting Dear Ken I am sorry to say that earlier this week Arthur Levitt was called to testify in Congress early on September and he felt unable to make our session as originally planned It is my hope that we can reschedule with him prior to or in conjunction with the final report For those who may have changed their schedules to make this meeting because of the chance to talk to Arthur I regret the inconvenience In deference to your time well go ahead with the meeting from to but not with the dinner Here are the details of the meeting Note that the location is different from the previous two meetings Wednesday September from to pm McKinsey Company East nd Street rd Floor New York NY Check in on rd floor with Carol Hubbard who will direct you to the conference room Phone Attached is the draft of our final report prepared by Tim Koller It will be the subject of the meeting We will want to gather your comments on the following Do you agree with the substance of this draft Are there points that should receive more or less emphasis Are there any other issues you would like to raise Is there anything else about the drafting and presentation that you would like to comment on We will need to get everyones comments one way or another by the end of September so we can proceed to prepare the final paper which wed like to have ready by the end of October Originally you said that you would not be able to make the meeting Could you let us know if your plans have changed and you can now come or participate by phone See below for reply I will be there I will participate by phone I cannot make it at all but will email comments by September Many thanks Jeff cc Tim Koller SEC Panel Draft Report Sepdoc See attached file SEC Panel Draft Report Sepdoc

RE Panel on ValuationLet me know if you didnt get yesterdays email regarding Nov It had the callin number Valerie Original Message From mailto Sent Monday November PM To Garten Jeffrey Subject Re Panel on Valuation Ken Lay can do November at pm EST or November at pm EST November is not good for him Thanks Rosalee Garten Jeffrey on AM To rick cc Petersen Valerie Subject Panel on Valuation I am sorry for the delay in getting back to you with a revision of the paper Attached please find a revised summary by Tim Koller We hope it reflects well the discussion of our previous meeting Before the next meeting it is our intention to send along the longer discussion paper that would mirror this summary I suggest this next meeting take place as a conference call at one of the following times Please indicate with an X in the boxes next to the proposed dates which dates are good for you Monday November pm EST X Tuesday November pm EST Monday November pm EST X We would like to get everyones views in advance of this conference call either in writing or by phone Please indicate below what your preference would be If a call is preferred Valerie Petersen will contact your office to set it up Call Writing There will be one last meeting scheduled after the conference call meeting takes place to go over the final draft Look forward to hearing from you Thanks very much Jeff SEC Doc Draft shortdoc See attached file SEC Doc Draft shortdoc

FW Panel on Valuation Cc Original Message From Garten Jeffrey Sent Monday November PM To Subject FW Panel on Valuation Original Message From Garten Jeffrey Sent Monday November PM To Cc Petersen Valerie Subject Panel on Valuation Since the overwhelming majority of you can participate in a conference call on Monday November at pm EST we suggest locking that in now So please put it on your schedule The dialin number will be participant code I will only need your comments in advance if you cannot attend the teleconference on the th If you cannot attend please contact Valerie Petersen at to set up a time for a preconference call between the two of us You may also get your comments to me in writing Best Jeff
